lore: Malcolm Graves is a renowned mercenary, gambler, and thief—a wanted man in every city and empire he has visited. Even though he has an explosive temper, he possesses a strict sense of criminal honor, often enforced at the business end of his double-barreled shotgun Destiny. In recent years, he has reconciled a troubled partnership with Twisted Fate, and together they have prospered once more in the turmoil of Bilgewater's criminal underbelly.
title: the Outlaw
blurb: Malcolm Graves is a renowned mercenary, gambler, and thief—a wanted man in every city and empire he has visited. Even though he has an explosive temper, he possesses a strict sense of criminal honor, often enforced at the business end of his...
allytips: Smoke Screen can be used both to escape and to set up a kill.
Using Quickdraw to get into range and delivering a point blank Buckshot can do lots of damage.

passive.name: New Destiny
passive.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

enemytips: Graves deals mostly physical damage so Armor is an effective counter.
Leaving the Smoke Screen's area of effect removes the harmful effect immediately.
name: Graves

spells.name: End of the Line
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line.

After 2 seconds or {{ e6 }} seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line. After 2 seconds or {{ e6 }} seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

spells.name: Smoke Screen
spells.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.
spells.tooltip:
Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out.

Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and have their movement speed reduced by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and have their movement speed reduced by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Quickdraw
spells.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spells.tooltip:
Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead.

Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit.

True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor (stacks up to {{ e0 }} times).
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit. True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor (stacks up to {{ e0 }} times).

spells.name: Collateral Damage
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.
